subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Though Fresno State was a formidable opponent, Rutgers players, like Rutgers fans, have come to view the loss on Sept. 1 as a game that slipped away.
snippet: Though Fresno State was a formidable opponent, Rutgers players, like Rutgers fans, have come to view the loss on Sept. 1 as a game that slipped away.
